name: Henrietta Mitchell
summary: Motivated and results-driven Business School graduate seeking a challenging position within a large organisation as a Business Analyst or Project Manager. Offering a strong foundation in business strategy, data analysis, and project management, with a proven ability to drive efficiency, deliver successful outcomes and collaborate within cross-functional teams.

details: Developed and implemented a streamlined process for gathering business requirements, reducing project delivery time by 15%.
Developed and implemented a standardised reporting framework, resulting in improved visibility of key performance metrics and enabling data-driven decision-making at all levels of the organisation.
Assisted project managers in planning and executing various projects, ensuring adherence to project timelines and deliverables.
Monitored project budgets, tracked expenses, and prepared financial reports to ensure cost-effectiveness and adherence to financial guidelines.
Prepared and served a variety of beverages with precision and creativity, consistently meeting or exceeding quality standards, and receiving compliments for latte art and presentation.
